newsitem.title: USA: Ace Cash sets three-for-two stock split.
newsitem.headline: Ace Cash sets three-for-two stock split.

text.p: Ace Cash Express Inc on Tuesday said it has set a three-for-two stock split, to shareholders of record at November 15, with a delivery date of November 30.
The firm will distribute one additional share of common stock for each two shares of common stock outstanding.

"One of the principal purposes of this split is to improve the liquidity of ACE stock and encourage an increase in the trading activity of ACE stock for the benefit of our shareholders," Raymond Hemmig, chairman, said in a statement.

As of October 29, the company said it had 4,221,810 shares of common stock outstanding and will have approximately 6,332,715 shares outstanding immediately after the stock split. The company will pay cash for any fractional shares based on the closing price as of the record date as quoted on The Nasdaq Stock Market.
